mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction ( tran_no , prod_no , buyer_id, payment_option , receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, tran_status_code, order_date, dlvy_date ) VALUES( seq_transaction_tran_no.nextval , #{purchaseProd.prodNo} , #{buyer.userId} , #{paymentOption:VARCHAR} , #{receiverName:VARCHAR} , #{receiverPhone:VARCHAR}, #{divyAddr:VARCHAR}, #{divyRequest:VARCHAR} , #{tranCode:VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{divyDate:DATE} )
mapper.select: SELECT purchase.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(order by user_id) rn , ts.tran_no, u.user_id, TRIM(NVL(ts.tran_status_code,0)) tran_status_code, COUNT(*)OVER() count FROM users u, transaction ts WHERE u.user_id = ts.buyer_id AND u.user_id = #{list[1]}) purchase WHERE rn BETWEEN #{list[0].startRowNum} AND #{list[0].endRowNum}
